VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Loans of tokens with >18 decimals can result in incorrect collateral calculation.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Apply the same paradigm as _toWad to ensure that the collateral token of a loan is less than or equal to 18 decimals

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Potential huge arbitrage opportunities / MPL price decrease.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Hard to completely mitigate. Pool delegates should be especially careful when giving out high-value loans and demand high collateral lockup.

VulnerabilityDesc.Type: Bypass or reduction on the lockup period
VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Bypass or reduction on the lockup period of Pool FDTs.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Force users to wait for the lockup period when transferring FDT to others or let the depositDate variable record the timestamp of the last operation instead of a weighted timestamp
